eng:sai: The Prophet frowned and turned away
eng:arb: He frowned and turned away
ban: তিনি ভ্রূকুঞ্চিত করলেন এবং মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিলেন।

eng:sai: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
eng:arb: that the blind man came to him.
ban: কারণ, তাঁর কাছে এক অন্ধ আগমন করল।

eng:sai: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
eng:arb: And what should teach thee? Perchance he would cleanse him,
ban: আপনি কি জানেন, সে হয়তো পরিশুদ্ধ হত,

eng:sai: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
eng:arb: or yet remember, and the Reminder profit him.
ban: অথবা উপদেশ গ্রহণ করতো এবং উপদেশ তার উপকার হত।

eng:sai: As for he who thinks himself without need,
eng:arb: But the self-sufficient,

eng:sai: To him you give attention.
eng:arb: to him thou attendest

eng:sai: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
eng:arb: though it is not thy concern, if he does not cleanse himself.
ban: সে শুদ্ধ না হলে আপনার কোন দোষ নেই।

eng:sai: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
eng:arb: And he who comes to thee eagerly

eng:sai: While he fears [Allah],
eng:arb: and fearfully,

eng:sai: From him you are distracted.
eng:arb: to him thou payest no heed.

eng:sai: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
eng:arb: No indeed; it is a Reminder
ban: কখনও এরূপ করবেন না, এটা উপদেশবানী।

eng:sai: So whoever wills may remember it.
eng:arb: (and whoso wills, shall remember it)
ban: অতএব, যে ইচ্ছা করবে, সে একে গ্রহণ করবে।

eng:sai: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
eng:arb: upon pages high-honoured,

eng:sai: Exalted and purified,
eng:arb: uplifted, purified,

eng:sai: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
eng:arb: by the hands of scribes

eng:sai: Noble and dutiful.
eng:arb: noble, pious.

eng:sai: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
eng:arb: Perish Man! How unthankful he is!
ban: মানুষ ধ্বংস হোক, সে কত অকৃতজ্ঞ!

eng:sai: From what substance did He create him?
eng:arb: Of what did He create him?
ban: তিনি তাকে কি বস্তু থেকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন?

eng:sai: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
eng:arb: Of a sperm-drop He created him, and determined him,
ban: শুক্র থেকে তাকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন, অতঃপর তাকে সুপরিমিত করেছেন।

eng:sai: Then He eased the way for him;
eng:arb: then the way eased for him,

eng:sai: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
eng:arb: then makes him to die, and buries him,
ban: অতঃপর তার মৃত্যু ঘটান ও কবরস্থ করেন তাকে।

eng:sai: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
eng:arb: then, when He wills, He raises him.
ban: এরপর যখন ইচ্ছা করবেন তখন তাকে পুনরুজ্জীবিত করবেন।

eng:sai: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
eng:arb: No indeed! Man has not accomplished His bidding.
ban: সে কখনও কৃতজ্ঞ হয়নি, তিনি তাকে যা আদেশ করেছেন, সে তা পূর্ণ করেনি।

eng:sai: Then let mankind look at his food -
eng:arb: Let Man consider his nourishment.
ban: মানুষ তার খাদ্যের প্রতি লক্ষ্য করুক,

eng:sai: How We poured down water in torrents,
eng:arb: We poured out the rains abundantly,
ban: আমি আশ্চর্য উপায়ে পানি বর্ষণ করেছি,

eng:sai: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
eng:arb: then We split the earth in fissures

eng:sai: And caused to grow within it grain
eng:arb: and therein made the grains to grow

eng:sai: And grapes and herbage
eng:arb: and vines, and reeds,

eng:sai: And olive and palm trees
eng:arb: and olives, and palms,

eng:sai: And gardens of dense shrubbery
eng:arb: and dense-tree'd gardens,

eng:sai: And fruit and grass -
eng:arb: and fruits, and pastures,

eng:sai: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
eng:arb: an enjoyment for you and your flocks.

eng:sai: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
eng:arb: And when the Blast shall sound,

eng:sai: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
eng:arb: upon the day when a man shall flee from his brother,
ban: সেদিন পলায়ন করবে মানুষ তার ভ্রাতার কাছ থেকে,

eng:sai: And his mother and his father
eng:arb: his mother, his father,

eng:sai: And his wife and his children,
eng:arb: his consort, his sons,
ban: তার পত্নী ও তার সন্তানদের কাছ থেকে।

ara: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
eng:sai: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
eng:arb: every man that day shall have business to suffice him.
ban: সেদিন প্রত্যেকেরই নিজের এক চিন্তা থাকবে, যা তাকে ব্যতিব্যস্ত করে রাখবে।

eng:sai: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
eng:arb: Some faces on that day shall shine

eng:sai: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
eng:arb: laughing, joyous;

eng:sai: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
eng:arb: some faces on that day shall be dusty
ban: এবং অনেক মুখমন্ডল সেদিন হবে ধুলি ধূসরিত।

eng:sai: Blackness will cover them.
eng:arb: o'erspread with darkness --

eng:sai: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
eng:arb: those -- they are the unbelievers, the libertines.
